newsitem.title: USA: U.S. coffee roastings flat in latest week.
newsitem.headline: U.S. coffee roastings flat in latest week.

text.p: Complete Coffee Coverage reported U.S. green coffee roastings as follows:
For the week ended June 28, roastings totaled approximately 290,000 60-kg bags, unchanged from the previous week and compared with 280,000 bags in the corresponding week one year ago.
Cumulative roastings totaled 8,635,000 60-kg bags, versus 8,395,000 bags in the same year ago period.
